modalCountry.error: An error occurred while changing the country. Please try again.

modalProfile.error: An error occurred while changing the network profile. Please try again.

modalVoiceFilter.error: An error occurred while changing the filter. Please try again.

modalCallback.error: An error occurred while changing the callback.
modalCallback.successful: The callback has been successfully activated
modalCallback.successfuldesactivate: The callback has been successfully deactivated
modalCallback.title: Callback

modalIMSI.resetMobileIMSI: To change the IMSI, the mobile device must be restarted to apply the change correctly. This change can take up to 2 hours.
modalIMSI.error: An error has occurred changing the network IMSI. Please try again.
modalIMSI.successful: The IMSI has been successfully changed.

helpMessages.newPassword: You do not have an assigned password.

helpMessages.title: Important
helpMessages.message: Select the country where you are located to correctly calculate your balance, this balance is calculated based on the recommended profile

home-tab.welcomebanner-description: Products and services that protect all your communications
home-tab.protectYourself: Protect yourself from cybercriminals and keep your personal information secure
home-tab.distributors-title: Would you like to become our business partner to resell our products?
home-tab.distributors-description: If you have contacts who need cell phones, apps, or encrypted equipment, get in touch with us! You can become a distributor of our products
home-tab.aboutUsDescription: We specialize in secure communication equipment and software, such as cell phones, applications, and SIM cards. We aim to bring digital security to anyone or any company looking to protect their information and privacy. We work with the most secure and recognized systems around the world, which have been tested over the years and have proven to be impenetrable.
home-tab.securityPrivacy: Security and privacy in your communications with encrypted chats and calls
home-tab.noMSI: Our SIM does not emit an IMSI, protecting the origin of the connection.
home-tab.noLimit: There is no time limit to use the resources of your plan.
home-tab.simEconomy: The Encriptados SIM works in over 200 countries with ease of connection and cost-efficiency.
home-tab.locationSIM: You will have encryption for location data.
home-tab.noHistory: We do not store call history.
home-tab.anonimateSIM: It provides greater anonymity in calls through tools like DID, identifier substitution, and callback.
home-tab.simAlt: The SIM generates a substitute number randomly for each call.
home-tab.offerdescription: Check out our offers and get up to 25% more balance on your purchase.
home-tab.versiondescription: A new version is available. Would you like to update

header.title: Set up your Encrypted SIM
header.message: Take your security to another level with the Encrypted SIM
header.changeNameSimBanner: Change the name of your SIM.
header.newNameOfYourSim: Enter the new name for your SIM.
header.numberOfCharacters: Only a maximum of 9 characters are allowed.
header.nameOfSimMax: * The SIM name must be a maximum of 9 characters.

stepsList.title: How to activate your SIM
stepsList.step1: Put the SIM in the phone
stepsList.step2: Dial *500# to get the connection code.
stepsList.step3: Enter the 6-digit or 19-digit code in “SIM ID”.

failed.title: Verification failed
failed.message: Check the ID and confirmation code. I have tried again.

requestCode.title: Enter the code
requestCode.message: Dial *500# to get the connection code

helpMessages.howToWorkHelpMessage: Request the code with your sim ID and dial *500# with the sim to obtain the verification code
helpMessages.SimHelpMessage: The sim ID is a 6-digit number that identifies your sim, it can be seen by dialing *110#

home.useFive: You can use up to 5 SIMs in the app.
home.howToReset: Set a new 4-digit password. If you enter your current password incorrectly more than 4 times, the device will erase your settings and SIMs for security reasons.
home.confirmNewPassword: Are you sure you want to set this new password?
home.confirmDeletePassword: Are you sure you want to delete the password?
home.networkProfileDescription: Would you like to change the network profile?
home.timeLeft: Time remaining for another profile change:
home.descriptionrequiredpassword: Set up a 4-digit password to maximize your privacy.
home.descriptionResetDevice: This process has deleted all SIM cards, the current configuration, and the password for security reasons.
home.modalActivatePasswordTitle: Are you sure you want to activate the password?
home.modalDesactivatePasswordTitle: Are you sure you want to deactivate the password?

profileHelp.title: Network Profile Help
profileHelp.message: Each country has a recommended roaming profile, which is considered the most stable and least expensive. Use the recommended profile for greater consumption efficiency and better network stability.

profileWarning.title: Important
profileWarning.description: Choosing a non-recommended profile could increase the service cost

description.title: Change your voice during calls.
description.message: With this feature you can modify your voice during incoming and outgoing calls.

tutorial.title: How does voice change work?
tutorial.message: The voice change is a feature that you can activate when making calls, using a filter that distorts the sound of the voice to avoid an identifiable voice record.

changeImsi.title: Change IMSI
changeImsi.description: With this function you can change the unique identification number of your SIM card. The equivalent of changing the SIM chip.

success.title: Successful change request
success.description: Please restart your device to apply the IMSI change.

failed.title: You do not have enough balance
failed.description: Please top up your balance to activate this feature.

substitute.title: Configure substitute
substitute.titleCountry: Enter a number with the country code

dynamic.label: Dynamic number substitution
dynamic.areYouSureDynamic: Do you want to switch to dynamic number substitution?
dynamic.tutorial: A random number will be generated every time you call

manual.label: Manual substitute number
manual.tutorial: Some numbers may be blocked to prevent fraud or identity theft.
manual.simNumber: Enter a number with the country code

help.title: How does it work?
help.message: Enter the phone number you want to use as a substitute in your calls. This number will appear on the caller ID of the person you are calling.

callback.title: Callback
callback.callbackDescription: Use an intermediary operator who will callback to securely link it without a direct link.

deleteSimModal.deleteTitle: Are you sure you want to delete your SIM

successfully.ok: Your SIM has been successfully added!

modalSimActivate.changeNameSimTitle: Your SIM name has been changed successfully.
